name: MegaKenny-Fangame
description:
Just like Maximilian, Kenny has recently been more active in responding, replying and retweeting what i been posting, so for the 5 time hype man, i made him into a Megaman character, the boss of this stage is Bass, Kenny requested this due to the use of Lucio weapon, so it's a battle of sounds!

NOTE: There are several bugs im aware of, here are a few, 1)Loading the game doesnt always seem to work, refreshing the page and clicking "Click to Start" again seems to fix it 2) if an enemy hits you while your near any of the stages walls or ceiling, there is a high chance you will get stuck inside of it, if this happens please press "ENTER" to get pulled out

thats all of the bugs im personally aware of, keep in mind this is just a prototype, and using only the "Free" version of Clickteam limits my options, but in the end i hope i made something enjoyable, any donations will probably be used to donate it back to Unrooolie and to possibly allow me to buy Clickteam fusion, you dont need to Donate, a feedback or any comments would be appreciated, take care and have fun playing, Latz!

Megaman Music was Downloaded from "downloads.khinsider" website, all credit goes to the original composers and Capcom
